= Things you need =
  * Python for Series 60 1.4.0 (for a list of phones and their Symbian version numbers see [http://www.nokiaport.de/index.php?pid=symbiannokia&mid= NokiaPort]
    * [http://downloads.sourceforge.net/pys60/PythonForS60_1_4_0_2ndEd.sis?modtime=1183735938&big_mirror=0 2nd edition]
    * [http://downloads.sourceforge.net/pys60/PythonForS60_1_4_0_2ndEdFP2.sis?modtime=1183735938&big_mirror=0 2nd edition FP2]
    * [http://downloads.sourceforge.net/pys60/PythonForS60_1_4_0_2ndEdFP3.SIS?modtime=1183735938&big_mirror=0 2nd edition FP3]
    * [http://downloads.sourceforge.net/pys60/PythonForS60_1_4_0_3rdEd.sis?modtime=1183735938&big_mirror=0 3rd edition]
  * A good file explorer
